titleStmt.title: The first book of Amadis of Gaule
Amadís de Gaula (Spanish romance). Book 1. English.
titleStmt.author: Munday, Anthony, 1553-1633.

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Anthony Munday, of Nicolas de Herberay's French translation of the Spanish text.
Caption title. Printer and suggested imprint date from STC.
Imperfect; title page and dedication lacking.
